trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The frazzled researcher seeks help in chasing down a missing creature.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_TODO_00<tab>Capture the charybdis at Peripeteia Krystalline.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the captured charybdis to the frazzled researcher.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_001<tab>You there! Please, it is most urgent. A colleague of mine in Philomythes Notos has just sent word of a most disturbing nature.

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_002<tab>A blue charybdis was practicing its flying, but became separated from its fellows. From what I gathered, based on my friend's manic message, it was last seen taking wing to Peripeteia Krystalline.

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_003<tab>We are all of us searching far and wide, but could you look in the direction of Peripeteia Krystalline? Your help will not go unrewarded, I can assure you of that.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_004<tab>Oh, thank you! Between us, we ought to be able to locate this lost creature.

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_005<tab>You should know that charybdises have a penchant for heights, so I will scan the skies around here. I leave the upper floors of Peripeteia Krystalline to you.

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_006<tab>If you do happen to find the creature I spoke of, use this aetheric rope to bind it. Ah, not to worry: the bindings cause no injury or pain. Good luck, and I shall see you soon.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>There is no sign of the charybdis.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The charybdis is nowhere to be seen...
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Now that you've captured the injured charybdis, return to Poieten Oikos and deliver your winged captive to the frazzled researcher.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_020<tab>I saw that you were on your way back, and hastened to return as well. So, what news? Have you found that blue charybdis?

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_021<tab>Oh, a great relief indeed! It's rather impressive it hasn't suffered any truly grievous injuries...and more impressive still that it was able to fly as far as Peripeteia Krystalline.

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_022<tab>It had only begun to practice the art of flight recently, as I understand it. Who would have thought it could cross such a distance with wings still so inexperienced? No doubt credit for this ought go to Emet-Selch and his helpful instruction.
TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_023<tab>Well, I for one cannot wait to see the charybdis take to the skies from its perch.

TEXT_AKTKZH016_04311_HURRYOBSERVER04311_000_024<tab>At any rate, I will see this creature returned to Anagnorisis at once. Though it isn't much, considering the services you've rendered, I hope it's not too lowly a prize for you.
